name: deerstalker
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a soft hat with two peaks (= flat curved parts that stick out), one at the back and one at the front, and coverings for the ears that are usually worn turned up: Sherlock Holmes's deerstalker
UroshPetrovic/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
